    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Starts the MicroTrader server. The method should setup a server socket and begin to accept connections. This method must return immediately after a server socket has been setup, and another thread should started to listen for connections.
        Specified by:
        start in interface ServerComm

      • getNextMessage

        public ServerSideMessage getNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Get the next message received from one of the clients. If no message is has been received, the method blocks until a message is received. If no message will ever be received, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getNextMessage in interface ServerComm
        Returns:
        The next message sent by one of the connected clients to the server

      • hasNextMessage

        public boolean hasNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Checks if a message from a client is pending. If ServerComm.hasNextMessage() returns true, a call to ServerComm.getNextMessage() will return immediately with the oldest message in the queue. If ServerComm.hasNextMessage() returns false, a call to ServerComm.getNextMessage() will block until a message has been received.
        Specified by:
        hasNextMessage in interface ServerComm
        Returns:
        true if a message from a client is currently pending, otherwise false.

      • sendOrder

        public void sendOrder(java.lang.String receiversNickname,
                      Order order)
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Send an order to a client.
        Specified by:
        sendOrder in interface ServerComm
        Parameters:
        receiversNickname - nickname of the client to receive the order. If no client with the nickname is currently connected, no order is sent.
        order - order to send.
